comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: There's an oral history interview with Borsook here: oralhistories.library.caltech.edu/24/ His papers are at CalTech: www.oac.cdlib.org/findaid/ark:/13030/tf1p3001cj/ His daughter Eve Borsook (b. 1929) is an art historian of note: www.dictionaryofarthistorians.org/borsooke.htm
